subject: Re: New Files From RS 470_12-18-07
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Bruce, I think I asked this before, but what microphone are you using 
and how is everything plugged together?  If I understand correctly, 
you are using an older 12-470 with a mic in front of it recording you 
and the built-in speaker, correct?  Your earlier recordings sounded 
like a studio mic or something - very nice.

I have been playing with the Listen Up mic into the recorder, as well 
as a lapel mic.  You seem to have less static...I am going to go 
listen to your latest uploads and let you know what I think.

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> hey guy's 
> 
> I just posted a bunch of new file to folder RS 470 12-18-07 in the 
> files section.
> 
> have a listen and please leave some feedback.
> 
> Bruce
>
